title: Create a Quarkus extension for ArgoCD

labels.name: area/quarkiverse
labels.description: This issue/PR is part of the Quarkiverse organization

body:
### Description

ArgoCD does provide Kubernetes CRD for defining application etc. It would be great if there was a Kubernetes Client extension for ArgoCD that would be usable by Quarkus.

Additionally, we would benefit from an extension that could automatically generate the `Application` CR pointing to our generated manifests for helm / kubernetes.

The extension could also provide a CLI module for interacting with those CRDs and regenerating customizing the generated resources.

A first implementation of such extension can be found at: https://github.com/iocanel/quarkus-argocd

### Repository name

quarkus-argocd

### Short description

An ArgoCD extension for Quarkus

### Repository Homepage URL

https://quarkiverse.github.io/quarkiverse-docs/quarkus-argocd/dev/

### Repository Topics

- quarkus-extension
- cloud
...


### Team Members

- iocanel
